name: It Knocks At Night
description:
It Knocks At Night: Created by Tom Clement (@TomAClement). Based on 'Knock' by Frederic Brown.

"The last man on Earth sat alone in a room. There was a knock at the door..."

The bombs dropped at the End of Days. You are all alone. You've barred the front door.

But every night, something...or someone, knocks on the door and wants to come inside.

Will you give in to temptation and see who is outside, or will you stay strong and keep the door locked?

Created for the Book Adaptation Jam (FMJ #2).
